co.poynt.os.services.v1

Interface IPoyntTransactionService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.os.IInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IPoyntTransactionService.Stub

    public interface IPoyntTransactionService
extends android.os.IInterface
    Provides necessary interfaces to create and manage Transactions. All operations require network connectivity except for the 'get' operations, in which case, data from the local Poynt Transactions content provider is returned. Poynt Transactions content provider is updated whenever the transaction are modified locally or on the cloud. All calls require the necessary permissions declared in the caller's Android Manifest file. Please refer to Poynt OS Permissions for more details.
    Since:
    1.0-beta2

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPoyntTransactionService.Stub
      Local-side IPC implementation stub class.

    • Method Detail

      • createTransaction

        void createTransaction(co.poynt.api.model.Transaction transaction,
                     java.lang.String requestId,
                     IPoyntTransactionServiceListener callback)
                       throws android.os.RemoteException
        Creates the transaction in Poynt Cloud and also saves the created transaction in Poynt Transaction content provider. This interface only creates the transaction and does not process it.
        Parameters:
        transaction - co.poynt.api.Transaction
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntTransactionServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • processTransaction

        void processTransaction(co.poynt.api.model.Transaction transaction,
                      java.lang.String requestId,
                      IPoyntTransactionServiceListener callback)
                        throws android.os.RemoteException
        Processes the given transaction through Poynt Cloud and also saves the processed transaction in local Poynt Transaction content provider.
        Parameters:
        transaction - co.poynt.api.Transaction
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntTransactionServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • voidTransaction

        void voidTransaction(java.lang.String transactionId,
                   java.lang.String requestId,
                   IPoyntTransactionServiceListener callback)
                     throws android.os.RemoteException
        Voids any pending authorizations through Poynt Cloud and also updates the transaction in local Poynt Transaction content provider.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - ID of the transaction to void
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntTransactionServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • captureTransaction

        void captureTransaction(java.lang.String transactionId,
                      co.poynt.api.model.AdjustTransactionRequest captureRequest,
                      java.lang.String requestId,
                      IPoyntTransactionServiceListener callback)
                        throws android.os.RemoteException
        Captures the transactions through Poynt Cloud and also updates the transaction in local Poynt Order content provider. When partial payment captures are required, an co.poynt.api.AdjustTransactionRequest object with the partial capture information can be passed as an argument. When only transactionId is provided, the payment is captured completely.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - ID of the transaction to capture
        captureRequest - co.poynt.api.AdjustTransactionRequest
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntTransactionServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • captureAllTransactions

        void captureAllTransactions(java.lang.String requestId)
                            throws android.os.RemoteException
        Captures all authorized transactions through Poynt Cloud
        Parameters:
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • updateTransaction

        void updateTransaction(java.lang.String transactionId,
                     co.poynt.api.model.AdjustTransactionRequest updateRequest,
                     java.lang.String requestId,
                     IPoyntTransactionServiceListener callback)
                       throws android.os.RemoteException
        Updates the given transaction in the Poynt Cloud and updates local Poynt Transaction content provider.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - ID of the transaction to update
        updateRequest - AdjustTransactionRequest
        requestId - RequestId for Idempotency enforcement
        callback - IPoyntTransactionServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getTransaction

        void getTransaction(java.lang.String transactionId,
                  java.lang.String requestId,
                  IPoyntTransactionServiceListener callback)
                    throws android.os.RemoteException
        Retrieves the given transaction from the local Poynt Transaction content provider if available, otherwise fetches from the Poynt Cloud .
        Parameters:
        transactionId - ID of the Transaction to retrieve
        requestId - RequestId for tracking the request
        callback - IPoyntTransactionServiceListener
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException
